DataSource.Query: SELECT finance.transaction_master.value_date, finance.transaction_master.book_date, finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id AS tran_id, finance.transaction_master.transaction_code AS tran_code, finance.transaction_master.book, finance.transaction_details.statement_reference, finance.get_account_name_by_account_id(finance.transaction_details.account_id) AS account, CASE WHEN finance.transaction_details.tran_type = 'Dr' THEN COALESCE(finance.transaction_details.amount_in_local_currency, 0) END AS debit, CASE WHEN finance.transaction_details.tran_type = 'Cr' THEN COALESCE(finance.transaction_details.amount_in_local_currency, 0) END AS credit, account.get_name_by_user_id(finance.transaction_master.user_id) AS posted_by FROM finance.transaction_master INNER JOIN finance.transaction_details ON finance.transaction_details.transaction_master_id = finance.transaction_master.transaction_master_id WHERE finance.transaction_master.verification_status_id > 0 AND finance.transaction_master.value_date BETWEEN @From AND @To AND finance.transaction_master.office_id IN (SELECT * FROM core.get_office_ids(@officeId)) ORDER BY finance.transaction_master.value_date;
